comments.en: 1 colour (CMY) cartridge and optionally 1 black (K) cartridge

Very cheap entry level model.

Super cheapo printer (49 dollars at HP), comes with only the color (CMY) cartrdge (black cartridge optional), very small cartridges (10 ml black, 8 ml color smaller than the cartridges of the portable DeskJet 450).

Does not understand PCL as most other DeskJets, it uses the so-called "Lightweight Imaging Device Interface Language" (LIDIL), therefore there is no free software driver for this model yet.
